forest_road.name: Road of the Forest
forest_road.description: The Road of the Forest is a major road that runs from Marienburg to Altdorf. It is the main trade route between the two cities.

skulls_road.name: Road of the Skulls
skulls_road.description: The Road of the Skulls is a major road that runs from Marienburg to Middenheim. It is the main trade route between the two cities.

damned_road.name: Road of the Damned
damned_road.description: The Road of the Damned is a major road that runs from Marienburg to Nuln. It is the main trade route between the two cities.

dead_road.name: Road of the Dead
dead_road.description: The Road of the Dead is a major road that runs from Marienburg to Talabheim. It is the main trade route between the two cities.

exile_path.name: Path of the Exile
exile_path.description: The Path of the Exile is a major road that runs from Marienburg to Wissenland. It is the main trade route between the two cities.
